gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata Part 2 Extensions for imagery and gridded data

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
LODS, the Hawaii Longline Observer Data System, is a complete suite of tools designed to collect, process, and manage quality fisheries data and information. Guided by the principles of the NOAA Data Quality Act, LODS is the result of the collaboration and cooperation of scientists, data collectors and information management experts across the NOAA Fisheries Pacific Islands Region.
LODS is an end-to-end data management solution, articulating the four major data management areas of data collection management, data resource development, data maintenance and data dissemination. Every effort was made to eliminate redundant or unnecessary data items and to have the core data collection items be formally adopted by data stewards that would assume the responsibility of maintaining complete documentation and regular review of the quality, objectivity and suitability of the data item.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: To store observer data and allow end users to acquire data as requested.

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act
DOC/NOAA/NMFS/PIRO > Pacific Islands Regional Office, National Marine Fisheries Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Global Change Master Directory (GCMD) Data Center Keywords

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Pacific Islands Regional Office Observer Program

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: NOAA provides no warranty, nor accepts any liability occurring from any incomplete, incorrect, or misleading data, or from any incorrect, incomplete, or misleading use of the data. It is the responsibility of the user to determine whether or not the data is suitable for the intended purpose.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Access Constraints: Only individuals with a signed non-disclosure agreement on file may access these data. | Use Constraints: Data must not be shared with non-authorized individuals.

gmd:code.gco:CharacterString: North-Central Pacific Ocean...including waters inside and outside of our EEZ.

gml:TimePeriod.gml:description: The first trip deployed Feb 27 1994 and trips are still deployed.

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Data are checked visually prior to data entry by observer and by a debriefer (first check). Data validations are run after data entry and all data are read back to catch and minimize data errors. Second data check is visually conducted on all data with a full read back of all data and data validations are run by second debriefer. Third data check is conducted on selected data fields and data validations are run by a third debriefer.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: After fishery observers collect fishery-related data on longline vessels they are debriefed post-trip and enter the data in the database.
